use test;
0 rows returned

--create topic testtopic;
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 bigint,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        v0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1;

| col1                 |

| null                 |
| -9223372036854775808 |
| -45443               |
| -2325                |
| -2325                |

--create topic testtopic;
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 int,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        v0,
        v1
    )
);

--delete topic testtopic;

--create topic testtopic;
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 tinyint,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        v0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

| col1 |

| null |

| -101 |
| -100 |
| -65  |
| -65  |
| -43  |
| 0    |
| 1    |
| 12   |
| 23   |
| 31   |
| 100  |
| 127  |

--delete topic testtopic;

--create topic testtopic;
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 double,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        v0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

--create topic testtopic;
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 decimal(10,2),
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        v0,
        v1
    )
);

    col0 bigint,
    col1 varchar,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        v0,
        v1
    )
);

--delete topic testtopic;

--create topic testtopic;
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 timestamp,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        v0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

| col1                       |

| 2020-01-01 01:00:00.000000 |
| 2020-01-01 01:00:01.000000 |
| 2020-01-02 01:17:06.000000 |
| 2020-01-04 14:26:03.000000 |
| 2020-01-11 04:55:59.000000 |
| 2020-10-13 21:23:47.000000 |
| 2028-04-07 06:13:02.000000 |

--delete topic testtopic;

--create topic testtopic;
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        v0,
        v1
    )
);
0 rows returned

drop source test_source_1;
0 rows returned
--delete topic testtopic;

--create topic testtopic;
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 int,
    col2 int,
    col3 int,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        v0,
        v1,
        v2,
        v3
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_9;

select col1, col2, col3 from test_source_1 order by col1, col2, col3;

| col1        | col2        | col3        |
+-----------------------------------------+
| null        | -1000       | -1000       |
| null        | -1000       | 1000        |
| null        | 1000        | -1000       |
| null        | 1000        | 1000        |
| -1000       | null        | 1000        |
| -1000       | -1000       | -1000       |
| -1000       | -1000       | 1000        |
| -1000       | 1000        | null        |
| 1000        | null        | -1000       |
| 1000        | -1000       | 1000        |
| 1000        | 1000        | -1000       |
| 1000        | 1000        | 1000        |
+-----------------------------------------+
